text: Allahako margama aphna sampatti ra jyanale yud'dha garne momina ra bina ucita karana basirahane momina eka samana huna sakdainan. Allahale, aphna jyana ra malasita yud'dha garne mominala'i tyasai basirakhne mathi dherai sresthata pradana gareko cha, yadyapi allahale sabai mominala'i ramro sthanako vacana di'eko cha tara thulo puraskarako drstikonale allahale jihada garneharula'i, basirakhnemathi mahanata pradana gareko cha
